All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Administrator
Entity that represents an administrator in the database.
AdministratorRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Administrator entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<Administrator> for type safety.
AdministratorService
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for Administrator entities.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<Administrator> for type safety.
City
Entity that represents a city in the database.
CityController
Controller for city endpoints
CityDTOMapper
Service that converts City entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
CityRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for City entities.
CityResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning cities in the outgoing body
CityService
Service class that handles the business logic for City entities.
Conversation
Entity that represents a conversation in the database.
ConversationAlreadyStartedException
Exception thrown when a tourist tries to start a conversation with a guide when a conversation already exists.
ConversationController
Controller for conversions and messages endpoints
ConversationCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating conversations in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters
ConversationDTOMapper
Service that converts Conversation entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
ConversationRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Conversation entities.
ConversationResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning conversations in the outgoing body.
Note that the messages field can be null (see example) for performance reasons.
ConversationService
Service class that handles the business logic for Conversation entities.
Guide
Entity that represents a guide in the database.
GuideDTOMapper
Service that converts Guide entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
GuideRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Guide entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<Guide> for type safety.
GuideService
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for Guide entities.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<Guide> for type safety.
InteractionAlreadyPerformedException
Exception thrown when a user tries to interact with a tour when that interaction has already been performed and isn't expected to be repeatable.
Message
Entity that represents a message in the database.
Usually is used as a part of a conversation.
MessageCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating messages in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters and mapped to the corresponding boolean direction field as indicated by Message.direction logic.
MessageDTOMapper
Service that converts Message entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
MessageRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Message entities.
MessageResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning messages in the outgoing body
MessageService
Service class that handles the business logic for Message entities.
PasswordManager
Utility class that provides methods for hashing passwords.
Report
Entity that represents a report in the database.
ReportCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating reports in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters
ReportDTOMapper
Service that converts Report entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
ReportRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Report entities.
ReportResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning reports in the outgoing body
ReportService
Service class that handles the business logic for Report entities.
Review
Entity that represents a review in the database.
ReviewCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating reviews in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters and creationDate is set to the current timestamp
ReviewDTOMapper
Service that converts Review entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
ReviewRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Review entities.
ReviewResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning reviews in the outgoing body
ReviewService
Service class that handles the business logic for Review entities.
ServletInitializer
Servlet initializer class for the Spring Boot application.
Stop
Entity that represents a tour stop in the database.
Usually is used as a part of a tour.
StopCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating stops in the incoming body.
Usually is used as a part of a tour creation request.
StopDTOMapper
Service that converts Stop entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
StopResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning stops in the outgoing body.
Usually is used as a part of a tour response.
Tag
Entity that represents a tag in the database.
TagController
Controller for tag endpoints
TagDTOMapper
Service that converts Tag entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
TagRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Tag entities.
TagResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning tags in the outgoing body
TagService
Service class that handles the business logic for Tag entities.
Theme
Entity that represents a tag in the database.
ThemeController
Controller for theme endpoints
ThemeDTOMapper
Service that converts Theme entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
ThemeRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Theme entities.
ThemeResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning themes in the outgoing body
ThemeService
Service class that handles the business logic for Theme entities.
Tour
Entity that represents a tour in the database.
TourActionsResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning tour available interactions in the outgoing body.
Its purpose is to provide the client a way to dynamically show or hide UI elements based on actually performable actions.
Each property name is an action that could be performed on a tour.
TourController
Controller for tour endpoints
TourCreateDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for creating or editing tours in the incoming body.
Information about the author is implicitly obtained from other request parameters.
TourDTOMapper
Service that converts Tour entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
Tourist
Entity that represents a tourist in the database.
TouristDTOMapper
Service that converts Tourist entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
TouristRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Tourist entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<Tourist> for type safety.
TouristService
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for Tourist entities.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<Tourist> for type safety.
TourNotMarkedException
Exception thrown when a tourist tries to review a tour without having previously marked it
TourRepository
Repository that provides CRUD operations for Tour entities.
TourResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning tours in the outgoing body
TourSearch
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This class is responsible for searching tours based on a generic strategy.
TourSearchDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for searching tours in the incoming body.
Note that all fields are optional.
TourSearchStrategy
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This interface generalizes a search strategy for tours.
TourSearchStrategyAdministrator
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Administrators.
This strategy can look for public and privatee tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): reports count reviews count marked count
TourSearchStrategyGuide
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Guides.
This strategy can look for public and private (only if created by the current guide) tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): created by current guide reviews count marked count
TourSearchStrategyTourist
Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Tourist.
This strategy can look for public and private (only if shared with the current tourist) tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): reviews count marked count
TourService
Service class that handles the business logic for Tour entities.
User
Entity that represents a user in the database.
All subclasses are mapped to the same table but managed by different repositories.
UserController
Controller for user endpoints
UserDTOMapper
Service that converts User entities from and to DTOs.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side.
UserLoginDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for logging in users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserLoginDTO.username field is trimmed and case-insensitive.
UserRegisterDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for registering users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserRegisterDTO.username field is trimmed and case-insensitive while UserRegisterDTO.firstName and UserRegisterDTO.lastName fields are trimmed only.
UserRepository<T extends User>
Repository that provides CRUD operations for User entities.
This repository is used for typing purposes only and can't be injected directly.
UserRepositoryImpl
Repository that provides CRUD operations for User entities.
Only overrides interface method for typing purposes.
Should be injected as UserRepository<User> for type safety.
UserResponseDTO
Implementation of DTO pattern for returning users in the incoming body.
Note that the UserResponseDTO.role field is mapped based on the actual User subclass.
UserRole
Utility enum for communicating user roles with the client.
Note that the ordinal of each value must match the client side.
UserRoleMapper
Utility class that maps User entities to UserRole enums based on their subclass.
Is usually used in controller to communicate with client side and let it be more flexible.
UserService<T extends User>
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the common business logic for all User subclasses, independently of their concrete type.
UserServiceImpl
Implementation of the Factory Method design pattern.
Service class that handles the business logic for abstract User entities, independently of their concrete type.
Its only use it to provide the concrete instance of the UserRepository interface to the UserService superclass, which contains the generic business logic for all User entities.
Should be injected as UserService<User> for type safety.
WhatToSeeApisApplication
Main class for the Spring Boot application.
